JavaServer.Imports: java.util.ArrayList java.util.LinkedHashMap java.security.GeneralSecurityException java.security.Security java.security.MessageDigest java.security.spec.X509EncodedKeySpec java.security.KeyFactory java.security.PublicKey java.security.cert.X509Certificate java.security.interfaces.ECPublicKey java.io.IOException org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider org.webpki.crypto.CertificateUtil org.webpki.util.DebugFormatter org.webpki.sks.ws.TrustedGUIAuthorization org.webpki.sks.SKSException org.webpki.sks.EnumeratedKey org.webpki.sks.ProvisioningSession org.webpki.sks.EnumeratedProvisioningSession org.webpki.sks.DeviceInfo org.webpki.sks.KeyAttributes org.webpki.sks.InputMethod org.webpki.sks.PatternRestriction org.webpki.sks.KeyProtectionInfo org.webpki.sks.KeyData org.webpki.sks.Extension org.webpki.sks.SecureKeyStore
JavaServer.ClassHeader: /** * SKS Web Service Implementation. * * The purpose of the Web Service is creating a "singleton" * service that can concurrently be called by arbitrary * SKS-using applications. The Web Service can be connected * to any conformant SKS implementation. */

EmbedRule.Name: TGA

Method.Name: getDeviceInfo
createProvisioningSession
closeProvisioningSession
enumerateProvisioningSessions
abortProvisioningSession
signProvisioningSessionData
Method.Code: log (device_id, "signProvisioningSessionData (ProvisioningHandle=" + provisioning_handle + ")"); return getDevice (device_id).signProvisioningSessionData (provisioning_handle, data);

Method.Name: createPUKPolicy
createPINPolicy
createKeyEntry
getKeyHandle
Method.Code: log (device_id, "getKeyHandle (ProvisioningHandle=" + provisioning_handle + ", ID=" + id + ")"); return getDevice (device_id).getKeyHandle (provisioning_handle, id);

Method.Name: setCertificatePath
importSymmetricKey
Method.Code: log (device_id, "importSymmetricKey (KeyHandle=" + key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).importSymmetricKey (key_handle, symmetric_key, mac);

Method.Name: importPrivateKey
Method.Code: log (device_id, "importPrivateKey (KeyHandle=" + key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).importPrivateKey (key_handle, private_key, mac);

Method.Name: addExtension
Method.Code: log (device_id, "addExtension (KeyHandle=" + key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).addExtension (key_handle, type, sub_type, qualifier, extension_data, mac);

Method.Name: postDeleteKey
Method.Code: log (device_id, "postDeleteKey (ProvisioningHandle=" + provisioning_handle + ", TargetKeyHandle=" + target_key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).postDeleteKey (provisioning_handle, target_key_handle, authorization, mac);

Method.Name: postUnlockKey
Method.Code: log (device_id, "postUnlockKey (ProvisioningHandle=" + provisioning_handle + ", TargetKeyHandle=" + target_key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).postUnlockKey (provisioning_handle, target_key_handle, authorization, mac);

Method.Name: postUpdateKey
Method.Code: log (device_id, "postUpdateKey (KeyHandle=" + key_handle + ", TargetKeyHandle=" + target_key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).postUpdateKey (key_handle, target_key_handle, authorization, mac);

Method.Name: postCloneKeyProtection
Method.Code: log (device_id, "postCloneKeyProtection (KeyHandle=" + key_handle + ", TargetKeyHandle=" + target_key_handle + ")"); getDevice (device_id).postCloneKeyProtection (key_handle, target_key_handle, authorization, mac);

Method.Name: enumerateKeys
getKeyAttributes
getKeyProtectionInfo
getExtension
setProperty
deleteKey
exportKey
unlockKey
changePIN
setPIN
signHashedData
asymmetricKeyDecrypt
keyAgreement
performHMAC
symmetricKeyEncrypt
updateFirmware
listDevices
getVersion
Method.Code: return "1.0";

Method.Name: logEvent
Method.Code: log ("logEvent (Description=" + description + ")");
